'''Years''' and '''Year''' can refer to:
==Arda==
===Chronology===

*'''[[:Category:Years|Category:Years]]''', years of the [[legendarium]].

*The '''[[Dark Years]]''', the period when [[Sauron]] rose to power in the [[Second Age]].
*'''Time of Arda:'''
**[[Valian Years]]
**[[Days before days|Years of the Valar]]
**[[Years of the Trees]]
**[[Years of the Sun]]
*[[First Age 472|Year of Lamentation]], called so because of the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]].

===Books===
*'''''The Tale of Years (Chronology of the Westlands)''''', appearing as the '''[[Appendix B|second Appendix]]''' to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
*'''''[[Reckoning of Years]]''''', a book written by [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry Brandybuck]]
*''[[Yellowskin|Year-book of Tuckborough]]'', one of the oldest [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] chronicle books.

==Real-world==
===Chronology===
*'''[[:Category:Years (real-world)|Category:Years (real-world)]]'''
===Book chapters===
*"[[The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)|The Tale of Years]]", a chapter of the third part of [[The War of the Jewels|''The War of the Jewels'']].
*"[[The Tale of Years of the Second Age]]", the sixth chapter of ''[[The Peoples of Middle-earth]]''.
*"[[The Tale of Years of the Third Age]]", the eighth chapter of ''[[The Peoples of Middle-earth]]''.
